titles.title: Follow Me, Follow Me, Follow Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Follow me, follow me, follow me.
Only one thing dost thou lack to follow me.
Sell all that thou hast, take up thy Cross,
And follow me, and follow me, and follow me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll follow Thee, I'll follow thee, I'll follow Thee.
I will sell all that I have and follow Thee.
Deny myself, take up my Cross,
And follow Thee, and follow Thee, and follow Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be one with Me, be one with Me, be one with Me.
Thou art all fair and there is no spot in Thee.
Rise up, my love, and come away.
Be one with Me, be one with Me, be one with Me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I come to Thee, I come to Thee, I come to Thee.
Thou whom my soul dearly loveth, I come to Thee.
I'll hold Thee fast and not let Thee go
Till we are one, I in you, and you in me.
